Incredible Customer support, i recommend it 100%, very kind and quick and effective response.

Every time i've got open a ticket i've solve the problem the same day

Best cPanel Reseller I have Used

No wonder LimeNex has good reviews everywhere. They do really deserve 10 stars. Quality, performance, features and prices are all very good.

I have not experienced any problems migrating to their server and everything is running smoothly now.

Source (HostAdvice)
Click to expand...

I signed up LIMENEX reseller hosting and I am very happy with the server performance and price. The fact that they include whm/cpanel at such a price means they made very thin profit. But still, their server quality and performance is very good.

Thumbs up for you guys at LIMENEX!

Source (RateLobby)
Click to expand...

I am not a web geek but coming from the graphic design side... so I occasionally run into set-up problems, connection troubles, or being blocked. But the technicians are always patient with me and go a long way to make things right and work again.

Some of the problems though derived from the several hosting migrations over the years, which every time needed re-setting of all my connections, which then lead to these difficulties as such actions are not part of my daily routine.

Al in all I recommend Limenex very much.

Source (RateLobby)
Click to expand...

I have been using Limenex for several years and counting still. The support team is always very quick to respond with good advice and analysis, thus enabling for quick fixes. I'd give 6 stars throughout the board if I could but it only goes up to 5!

Source (Website Testimonials)
Click to expand...

This guys are fast like a hurricane with the support amazing job continue like this Thanks a lot

Source (Website Testimonials)
Click to expand...

I have been using Limenex hosting services for over 2 years now, I feel safe with their services and support. Their support team is one of the best and I always receive timely response for whatever issues I face with their server. The maximum time I waited since their initial response was 30 minutes. However, not to mention I have to use their support only on rare occasions. Most of my hosting needs are already in place so I hardly found the need to contact their support. If you are looking for a best inexpensive hosting company with top-notch support and service then Limenex will fulfill your need.

Source (Website Testimonials)
Click to expand...

Several years ago, I subscribed to one of Limenex's least expensive packages just so I would have some web space to play with and so I could have full control of any email addresses I wanted to create. My experience has been nearly trouble-free, but on the 2 or 3 occasions when I had a question or needed assistance, I felt like I was treated like their best customer. I give them high marks for both customer service and value.

Source (Website Testimonials)
